page.title: 13TRAFFIC IN WOODBOROUGH
page.content:
Car ownership survey findings:
Households with{3}cars 10.5% Households with{2}cars 37.2% Households with{1}car 44.2% Households with{0}cars 8.1%
13.9 employed residents work{in W'boro 82.4 work{within 15 miles of Woodboro. 3.7 work{more than 15 miles away.} Cars leaving W'boro,7.30 to 9.00 a.m. Tues.9th July:{600}(inc.thro'traffic).
On Main St.you see lorries,tractors, horses,bikes,motor-bikes,crop-sprayers buses and cars.Many would like to see the speed of traffic through the village effectively reduced.Some would like a lay-by outside the Post Office. Mothers and Toddlers Group would like to have a Pelican Crossing installed near that Post Office.
